title: APEX.TF Website Rules Global Management Methods
content:
(*Note: “Website”, “page”, “service”, “this site” and other special terms related to the website, unless otherwise specified, refer to the APEX.TF website. APEX.TF, that is, the “apex.tf” domain name represents this site. APEX.TF is a derivative project of FIUNG.COM TEAM)

Any articles (including pictures, videos, etc.) on this website are contributed by third parties unless otherwise specified (or the article user name is “APEX.TF & FIUNG.COM TEAM”), and have nothing to do with this site, nor do they represent the views of this site.

Contact

Complaints: abuse@fiung.com

Submissions: object@fiung.com

Rules

This website does not provide any content about illegal policies (laws), including but not limited to the following.

  • Obscenity, pornography, gambling, violence and other illegal information
  • Nazism and extreme political ideologies
  • Illegal EEA, UK, Switzerland, USA Network Management Regulations

The website supports multiple users to submit articles via email.

Driver Support

HEXO

Tridiamond.tech

Copyright

The website materials (including but not limited to fonts, search engines, color combinations, etc.) are subject to Tridiamond.tech’s right of interpretation,
but the website icons and user avatars are copyrighted by APEX.TF and FIUNG.COM TEAM.
